extension.description:
Redshift adjusts the color temperature of your screen according to your surroundings.
Requires Redshift to be installed!
Keyboard shortcuts can be defined like:
<keymap> <global> <keyboard> <!-- Toggle redshift on/off --> <t mod="ctrl">RunScript(service.linuxwhatelse.redshift,toggle)</t>
<!-- Turn redshift on --> <o mod="ctrl">RunScript(service.linuxwhatelse.redshift,on)</o>
<!-- Turn redshift off --> <k mod="ctrl">RunScript(service.linuxwhatelse.redshift,off)</k> </keyboard> </global> </keymap>
